amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount of troops stationed in Europe to 30,000 and would have cut overall end strength levels by 10,000 a year over the next five years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 60 printed in House Report 112-88 to reduce the amount of troops stationed in Europe to 30,000 and would cut overall end strength levels by 10,000 a year over the next five years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 323, 1 Present (Roll no. 365).
